sub_title: Head of Growth Marketing & BI | Product Owner (PSPO I) | SaaS | Reforge Alumni
summary:
Digital Marketing expert with 12+ years of experience in global marketing, product management and digital transformation for key brands in the logistics&supply chain, SaaS, and financial services industries. 

Experienced in driving performance marketing initiatives and delivering winning strategies that support corporate, client, and team goals. Focused on effective digital campaign production and planning, I maintain an emphasis on data analysis and reporting through granular digital tracking. 

Proven track record includes many successful digital campaign launches in international markets including APAC, MEA, Europe, and the USA.  I have led teams of great diversity, working alongside professionals from all over the world. 

A bilingual and entrepreneurial-minded marketing expert with proven results in managing corporate digital transformations through data-driven marketing. Experienced in spearheading marketing campaigns that inspire clients, expand market penetration and increase company profitability under strict budgetary constraints. Expertise in streamlining processes for cross-functional teams through the use of Agile techniques. With an unclouded vision, I streamline the work of those I lead while creating efficient cross-collaborative experiences.  

Key areas of expertise: 

Digital Transformation ◼ Performance Marketing ◼ Social Media Marketing (SMM) ◼ Campaign Management & Tracking ◼ Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) ◼ Search Engine Marketing (SEM) ◼Conversion Rate Optimisation (CRO) ◼ Product management ◼ Integrated Marketing◼ Lead Generation ◼ Customer Online Journey ◼ Go to Market Strategies ◼ Affiliate Marketing ◼ Digital Acquisition ◼ Team Management & Development ◼ Inbound Marketing ◼ Stakeholder Management ◼ Data Analytics ◼ Segmentation ◼ Digital Marketing Strategy ◼ E-Commerce ◼ Content Marketing ◼ Agile ◼ Scrum ◼ CRM ◼ Marketing Automation 

I have earned a Master’s degree in Marketing and a Bachelor’s Degree in Business Management. I was given the opportunity to experience two academic exchanges; to Rome and Prague. I am well-traveled, having worked internationally and am bilingual in Russian and English. 

I look forward to connecting with you. 

Igor

profile_positions.description:
Twill is an A.P. Moller-Maersk innovation pioneering a digital shift in the logistics and supply chain industry. 

 Currently leading the digital marketing and digital transformation efforts for Twill, I manage a responsive team to understand and embrace the modern digital evolution in the logistics and supply chain industry. Working in close collaboration with product and tech teams, I focus on ensuring complete alignment on all expectations of common projects.

  I have the pleasure of collaborating with Twill business leaders across China, Europe, Latin America, and the USA by providing marketing support and delivering global marketing campaigns. 

  The marketing product owner and the main point of contact for product and tech teams for marketing related projects. Work closely with marketing automation and data infrastructure product teams for the creation of joint roadmaps, project assignments, and backlog refinement.

- Digital campaign framework development and delivery of key campaigns including hassle-free paperwork, easy booking, complete price transparency and various platform-related campaigns. 
- Developed assets such as SEO optimised landing pages, Adwords, LinkedIn, and Facebook digital assets, responsive programmatic banners, and emails. 
- Full cycle campaign support from ideation to production, optimisation, and closing analysis. Ensure marketing message resonates with the target audience. 
- Boosted lead generation and demand generation from multiple channels, including but not limited to Adwords, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads.
- Led twill.net website optimisation project which included localisation in 3 languages (ES, DE, CN) and complete UX/UI revamp. 
- Working closely with the data analysts creating a solid framework for digital performance management. Introduced full transparency to the company, alongside the data infrastructure team, by developing reports and dashboards which reflect critical business metrics.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Marketing Lead, Product owner

profile_positions.description:
UNLEASH events attract the world’s leading entrepreneurs, visionaries, and disruptors in the HR and hospitality space, including Sir Richard Branson, Arianna Huffington, Edward Snowden, and Gary Vaynerchuk. Events are global and attract up to 5,000 attendees per event. 

Shifting customer acquisition teams from cold calling techniques, to high-quality lead generation and sales via digital channels, I led the digital transformation of UNLEASH. I ensured top digital campaign production by applying inbound marketing techniques. My biggest challenge was moving away from a team of general marketers and restructuring to include highly focused specialities such as performance marketers, campaign managers, social influencers managers, and media partnerships talent. I maintained a focus on driving revenue growth through multiple digital platforms ensuring a stable and positive ROI. Digital campaigns included CPC, CPM, CPA in target markets such as Europe (Netherlands, UK, France) and the USA. 

Dedicated to driving digital acquisitions & sales: 
- Leveraged SEO and paid initiatives to generate solid traffic growth 
- Significantly boosted digitally generated sales and quickly grew digitally generated revenue
- Led cross-functional team of designers and web developers for website design revamp and product landing pages conversion rate optimisation resulted in 3X increase of online form submissions
profile_positions.title: Head of Digital Marketing, Product owner

profile_positions.description:
The Exness Group is an international award-winning financial services provider. With clients trading volumes consistently in the region of $300B USD/month, Exness is ranked among the top 5 in the forex sector and one of the global Fintech leaders.  

Proudly contributed to the significant increase in trading volumes through development and effective implementation of a global marketing strategy. Ensured that profits grew exponentially through a successful brand strategy and digital marketing delivery across multiple regions including APAC, MENA, and CIS. 

Managed a multi-million dollar marketing budget with a focus on increasing quality conversions. Responsible for profit and loss for all digital activity and managed entire campaign process from campaign ideation to post campaign analysis. Set up the Singapore marketing hub, ensuring successful promotion across APAC and MEA, building regional marketing teams for TH, MY, ID, VI, IN, PK, BD, CN, and MEA with a total of 20 reports. 

- Created a scalable digital marketing model and introduced marketing automation, resulting in a significant trading volume increase
- Built a diverse team of high performing digital marketers
- Positioned as a leader for key marketing projects and campaign launches across multiple platforms 
- Effective implementation of Agile and Scrum for digital campaign production
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Director, Product owner

profile_positions.description:
Managed a team of 6 performance marketing specialists responsible for digital acquisition and retention activities such as search, display, affiliates, video, and email campaigns. New markets expansion included marketing research and launch of digital campaigns. I oversaw the end to end user experience and lifetime user journey. Managed the outsourced vendors including SEM and creative agencies, ensuring successful delivery of services which satisfied brand and regulatory requirements. 

- Identified global social media strategy and led the implementation of multiple platforms and regions
- Significantly improved ROI across 10 markets by developing a digital strategy that covered all stages of the marketing funnel
- Expanded affiliate database and trading volume growth through affiliate recruiting strategy
profile_positions.title: Head of Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Fully implemented the company’s digital acquisition strategy including social media advertising, AdWords, Baidu, and Sogou. Launched SEM campaigns for APAC and MEA markets providing intensive digital expansion to new markets. Developed a standardised set of digital campaigns for SEM and SMM, allowing fast expansion to new markets as well as introducing constant optimisation process for digital campaigns. Saved significant working hours by implementing Sizmek, a banner management software

- Shifted from in-house tracking system to UTM and introduced Google Tag Manager for advanced granular tracking
- Active customer acquisitions from display ads increased exponentially
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
NQA is a management consultancy and leading provider of certification services for quality, environment, energy, safety, and information security management. NQA operates in over 32 countries with clients spanning 70 countries.  

This career forming opportunity included a secondment in NQA Italy office, providing me with international experience. Focus included digital marketing activities such as email campaigns and social media management. 

- New customer acquisitions through successful SEM and social media campaign launches 
- Participant increase in paid seminars through active promotion of NQA’s educational programs
profile_positions.title: Marketing manager
